Articles.Content:
Let me share my latest creation.

A mining mission/exploration vehicle to visit most of the system planets/moons in a single mission.

To avoid the creation of a multiple vehicle solutions (Orbital refinery, minder miner, refueling vehicle, ore exploration satellite) I found much simple to create single craft.

I achieve to visit the Moon(twice, I had to come back to mine and refuel twice...), Minus (easy to mine), and then crashed on Eve.

It end up on Eve because doesn't support atmospherical operations yet... 

Here below before and after mining/refueling

This has been a pet project of mine for a while now, to create a single-launch ship to complete a grand tour that collects all possible science, mining fuel along the way. Perhaps some collaboration is in order.

For now I'm able land/mine/leave on nothing else moons.

Let me work on mining and leave Eve and Duna.

Than I'll share the craft file.
